image_prompt: Generate a Blizzard Concept Artists Styled fantasy scene featuring Elenor and her allies launching a powerful spell with the assistance of their magical fox companion, a flurry of powerful magical energy swirling around them. Include vivid colors and sparks of magical energy.
scene: Elenor and her allies, with the help of their magical fox companion, unleash a powerful spell aimed at the witch. The spell emerges in a rain of magical energy, lighting up the darkness of the forest and enveloping the witch.
choices: The witch retaliates with a spell of her own
The magical fox assists Elenor and her allies with an additional attack
